mapper.select: SELECT point_pk, user_pk, point, date, type, description, CASE DAYOFWEEK(date) WHEN 1 THEN '일' WHEN 2 THEN '월' WHEN 3 THEN '화' WHEN 4 THEN '수' WHEN 5 THEN '목' WHEN 6 THEN '금' WHEN 7 THEN '토' END AS day FROM point WHERE user_pk = #{userPk} ORDER BY date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point (user_pk, point, date) VALUES (#{userPk}, #{point}, NOW())
